overview: Some guys just want to fuck, but other guys love to watch their men get fucked… and we call those guys “Bareback Cuckolds”! Jeffrey Lloyd and Sean Xavier take a break from their boyfriends to flip-fuck. Sergeant Miles uses Drake Roger’s mouth and ass. Lincoln Tunnel shares his man, Geordie Jackson, with Jeffrey Lloyd. And Ashton Labruce becomes a voyeur to Max Arion and Sean Xavier’s sex romp!
title: Bareback Cuckolds
